name: 互動與行動媒體應用研究
description: 本課程主要為介入行動與互動多媒體在不同領域應用的發展現況與趨勢，並針對其在不同領域上應用的文獻進行導讀與分析，同時發展具體可行的創意應用策略。期能使同學能運用互動與行動媒體特性，整合創意思維，以多元表現型式豐富行動與互動媒體的創意應用，進行實作體驗並以適當之研究方法驗證其成效。
goals: 研討互動與行動多媒體的現況與發展
研討互動與行動多媒體的研究趨向與研究結果
研討互動與行動多媒體的研究方法
發展實驗性的創意互動與行動多媒體應用雛型
syllabus:
Week 1 A historical review of the development of digital media  
Week 2 The past, recent, and future trends of the interactive and mobile communication

Week 3 Literature review- interactive multimedia(1)：Developments of interactive media

Week 4 Literature review- interactive multimedia(2)：Virtual reality

Week 5 Literature review- interactive multimedia(3)：Mixed reality

Week 6 Literature review- interactive multimedia(4)： somatosensory interaction and virtual character modeling

Week 7 Summary of interactive media researches

Week 8 Literature review- applications of interactive technologies (1)：overview

Week 9 Literature review- applications of mobile technologies (2)：contextual-awareness and ubiquitous learning

Week 10 Literature review- applications of mobile technologies (3)：mobile games and pervasive games

Week 11 Literature review- applications of mobile technologies (4)：mobile technologies and cloud computing

Week 12 Hands-on experiences on mixed reality game development- game design

Week 13 Hands-on experiences on mixed reality game development- use of tools

Week 14 Hands-on experiences on mixed reality game development- game development

Week 15 Mixed reality game pilot test

Week 16 Final presentation (demonstration of game playing)

grading.note: Presentations and Discussions of Literature Review
